citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:15am on 22-APR-
21. A household member stated the licensee was not at home and would not return for several hours.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:15am on 22-APR-
21.  A household member stated the licensee was not at home and would not return for several hours. 
 
 
 
End Section
